meaningMnemonic: If 遣う is something along the lines of "to consider" then a "<kanji>small</kanji> consider" is what I'll give you for your <vocabulary>spending money</vocabulary>. Can I have some money? $50? No, how about a smaller consideration on that, maybe something that's more along the lines of an <vocabulary>allowance</vocabulary>?
readingMnemonic: The reading is the alternate reading of 小 and 遣う's reading. Watch out for the rendaku.
